snippet.title: A Long Way Down - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
►► Wishlist us on Steam
👉 https://bit.ly/2s7kfji

►► Follow us on social media 
Facebook 👉 https://www.facebook.com/alwdGame/
Twitter 👉 https://bit.ly/2GtcWZl

►► Join us on Discord
👉 https://discord.gg/7uhURkS

►► What's A Long Way Down ? 
👉 In A Long Way Down players will assemble a party and use their cards to survive, fight and build their way through a dark maze of monsters orchestrated by an evil mastermind. Hero or villain, their choices will lead them to judgement.

See you soon!
